mapper.select: select b.bill_id, b.user_id, b.bill_name, bill_date, u.user_name from bill b inner join user u on u.user_id = b.user_id where b.bill_state = 1

select b.bill_id, b.user_id, b.bill_name, bill_date, u.user_name from bill b inner join user u on u.user_id = b.user_id where concat(b.bill_name, u.user_name) LIKE CONCAT('%${bill_name}%', '%${user_name}%') and b.bill_state = 1

select u.user_name, u.user_sex, bu.buser_time, bu.buser_if, bu.buser_id, b.* from bill b inner JOIN buser bu on bu.bill_id = b.bill_id inner join user u on u.user_id = bu.user_id where b.bill_id = #{bill_id} and (bu.buser_if = 1 or bu.buser_if = 3)

select u.user_name, u.user_sex, bu.buser_time, bu.buser_if, bu.buser_id, b.* from bill b inner JOIN buser bu on bu.bill_id = b.bill_id inner join user u on u.user_id = bu.user_id where b.bill_id = #{bill_id} and u.user_name like '%${user_name}%' and (bu.buser_if = 1 or bu.buser_if = 3)
select b.*, u.user_name from buser bu inner join bill b on b.bill_id = bu.bill_id inner join user u on u.user_id = b.user_id where bu.user_id = #{user_id} and b.bill_state = 1

select b.*, bd.type_id, bd.bdetail_remarks, bd.bdetail_money, bd.bdetail_date, t.type_mark, t.type_name from bill b inner join buser bu on bu.bill_id = b.bill_id inner join bdetail bd on bd.bill_id = bu.bill_id and bd.user_id = bu.user_id inner join type t on t.type_id = bd.type_id where bu.bill_id = #{bill_id}

select b.user_id as found_id, b.bill_name, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_account, bu.buser_time, bu.buser_if from buser bu inner join bill b on b.bill_id = bu.bill_id inner JOIN user u on u.user_id = bu.user_id where bu.bill_id = #{bill_id}

select b.*, u.user_name from buser bu inner join bill b on b.bill_id = bu.bill_id inner join user u on u.user_id = b.user_id where bu.user_id = #{buuser_id} and b.user_id != #{buser_id} and b.bill_state = 1

select b.*, u.user_name from buser bu inner join bill b on b.bill_id = bu.bill_id inner join user u on u.user_id = b.user_id where bu.user_id = #{buuser_id} and b.user_id = #{buser_id} and b.bill_state = 1
select b.*, u.user_name from buser bu inner join bill b on b.bill_id = bu.bill_id inner join user u on u.user_id = b.user_id where bu.user_id = #{user_id} and b.bill_add = 1 and b.bill_state = 1
